mapper.select: select left (sidoCode, 2) sidoCode, sidoName from sidocode order by sidoCode
select left (gugunCode, 5) gugunCode, gugunName from guguncode where left (gugunCode, 2) = #{sido} order by gugunCode
select distinct dongName, dongCode from houseinfo where left (dongCode, 5) = #{gugun} order by dongName

select h.aptCode, h.aptName, h.buildyear, h.dongCode, h.dongName, h.jibun, h.lat, h.lng, si.sidoname, gu.gugunname, (select dealAmount from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode and no = (select max(no) from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode)) recentPrice from houseinfo h left join sidocode si on left (h.dongcode,2) = left (si.sidocode,2) left join guguncode gu on left (h.dongcode,5) = left (gu.guguncode,5) where dongCode = #{dong} order by aptName

SELECT h.aptCode, h.aptName, h.buildyear, h.dongCode, h.dongName, h.jibun, h.lat, h.lng, si.sidoname, gu.gugunname, (select dealAmount from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode and no = (select max(no) from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode)) recentPrice FROM housedeal join houseinfo h using (aptcode) left join sidocode si on left (h.dongcode, 2) = left (si.sidocode, 2) left join guguncode gu on left (h.dongcode,5) = left (gu.guguncode,5) limit 5 offset #{page}
SELECT count(*) FROM housedeal join houseinfo h using (aptcode)

SELECT h.aptCode, h.aptName, h.buildyear, h.dongCode, h.dongName, h.jibun, h.lat, h.lng, si.sidoname, gu.gugunname, (select dealAmount from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode and no = (select max(no) from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode)) recentPrice FROM housedeal join houseinfo h using (aptcode) left join sidocode si on left (h.dongcode, 2) = left (si.sidocode, 2) left join guguncode gu on left (h.dongcode,5) = left (gu.guguncode,5) where no =#{no}

SELECT distinct h.aptCode, h.aptName, h.buildyear, h.dongCode, h.dongName, h.jibun, h.lat, h.lng, si.sidoname, gu.gugunname, (select dealAmount from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode and no = (select max(no) from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode)) recentPrice FROM housedeal join houseinfo h using (aptcode) left join sidocode si on left (h.dongcode, 2) = left (si.sidocode, 2) left join guguncode gu on left (h.dongcode,5) = left (gu.guguncode,5) where h.aptCode = #{code} limit 5 offset #{page}

SELECT distinct h.aptCode, h.aptName, h.buildyear, h.dongCode, h.dongName, h.jibun, h.lat, h.lng, si.sidoname, gu.gugunname, (select dealAmount from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode and no = (select max(no) from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode)) recentPrice FROM housedeal join houseinfo h using (aptcode) left join sidocode si on left (h.dongcode, 2) = left (si.sidocode, 2) left join guguncode gu on left (h.dongcode,5) = left (gu.guguncode,5) where h.dongCode =#{code} limit 5 offset #{page}

SELECT distinct h.aptCode, h.aptName, h.buildyear, h.dongCode, h.dongName, h.jibun, h.lat, h.lng, si.sidoname, gu.gugunname, (select dealAmount from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode and no = (select max(no) from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode)) recentPrice FROM housedeal join houseinfo h using (aptcode) left join sidocode si on left (h.dongcode, 2) = left (si.sidocode, 2) left join guguncode gu on left (h.dongcode,5) = left (gu.guguncode,5) where h.aptName like concat('%', #{name}, '%') limit 5 offset #{page}
SELECT count(distinct h.aptCode) FROM housedeal join houseinfo h using(aptcode) where aptName like concat('%', #{name}, '%')

SELECT distinct h.aptCode, h.aptName, h.buildyear, h.dongCode, h.dongName, h.jibun, h.lat, h.lng, si.sidoname, gu.gugunname, (select dealAmount from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode and no = (select max(no) from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode)) recentPrice FROM housedeal join houseinfo h using (aptcode) left join sidocode si on left (h.dongcode, 2) = left (si.sidocode, 2) left join guguncode gu on left (h.dongcode,5) = left (gu.guguncode,5) where h.dongName like concat('%', #{name}, '%') limit 5 offset #{page}
SELECT count(distinct h.aptCode) FROM housedeal join houseinfo h using(aptcode) where dongName like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
